body:
Comment 1: 
I don't use git myself, so I don't know if your suggestion is sound. But if you want,
you could change the program
http://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/src/cmd/goinstall/download.go and submit your
change for review http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html. I'm sure, there will be some to
confirm or reject <g>.

Thank you.
